content.heroIntro: Welcome to MIRAMAR HILLS, a prestigious residential development by LOASA in the heart of Vera Playa, Almería. This exceptional collection of villas, apartments, penthouses, and bungalows represents a new standard of Mediterranean living, perfectly positioned between the pristine Blue Flag beaches and the thriving expat community of Vera. With prices starting from just €243,800, MIRAMAR HILLS offers extraordinary value compared to other Spanish coastal markets—40% less than major island developments. Each property features modern design, premium finishes, and optional private or communal pools. Whether you're seeking a holiday retreat, permanent residence, or investment opportunity with strong rental potential (€800 per week), MIRAMAR HILLS delivers on quality, location, and affordability. Completion is scheduled for April 1, 2027, with LOASA's trusted 10-year structural warranty backing every home.

locationSection.intro: Vera Playa is one of Almería's most sought-after coastal destinations, combining authentic Spanish charm with established international living. This beautiful stretch of the Costa Blanca offers year-round Mediterranean sunshine, dramatic coastal scenery, and a relaxed yet vibrant lifestyle. Vera has developed a thriving expat community where English is widely spoken, making it ideal for British and international buyers seeking genuine integration without language barriers. The town provides excellent healthcare, quality schools with international options, and superb recreational facilities. From championship golf courses to world-class beaches and authentic local markets, Vera delivers the complete Mediterranean experience with modern conveniences and professional services.

propertyFeatures.intro: MIRAMAR HILLS properties are built to exacting standards by LOASA, incorporating contemporary design with Mediterranean aesthetics. Each home features premium construction with modern amenities, energy-efficient systems, and high-quality finishes throughout. Whether choosing a spacious villa with private garden or a sophisticated penthouse, every property provides comfortable, sustainable living with attention to detail and durability. The development offers 2-3 bedroom configurations across 65-98m² of built space, with plot sizes ranging from 59-559m² depending on property type.
